action.action-desc: Mr. LoBiondo (for himself and Mr. Visclosky) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to extend the authorization of the Bulletproof Vest Partnership Grant Program through fiscal year 2018.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Bulletproof Vest Partnership Grant Act of 2015.

section.header: Extension of authorization of appropriations for bulletproof vest partnership grant program
section.text: Section 1001(a)(23) of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 (42 U.S.C. 3793(a)(23)) is amended by striking 2012 and inserting 2018.
